original_text: When that happened, all the people of Judah ran away to Egypt. They included the army officers, as well as ordinary people and important people. They were all afraid that the people of Babylon would come to punish them.
korean_text: 노소를 막론하고 백성과 군대 장관들이 다 일어나서 애굽으로 갔으니 이는 갈대아 사람을 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: all the people of Judah ran away to Egypt
as well as ordinary people and important people
that the people of Babylon would come to punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 백성들이 와서 자신들을 벌할까 봐
